description:
When medical malpractice or another form of personal injury occurs, people in Syracuse, New York, have the right to hold the negligent party accountable. At the law firm of Michaels & Smolak, P.C., our experienced attorneys have decades of combined experience obtaining settlements and awards in Geneva, Liverpool, Auburn, the Southern Tier and Central New York. You can trust us to fight for your best interests and strive to obtain maximum compensation for your losses.

Our personal injury practice includes matters such as dog bites, wrongful death, motor vehicle accidents, premises liability and construction accidents. During a free consultation, you will be able to tell us about your experience. The team at our law firm will listen to your concerns and answer your questions so you feel confident about how to move forward with your case.

There is no reason that you should have to suffer physical, financial and emotional damages because someone else was careless or made a mistake. Our law firm is committed to righting the wrongdoing through sharing your story, using expert testimony and presenting compelling arguments to secure compensation. When you work with our team at Michaels & Smolak, P.C., you can expect compassionate, professional representation from attorneys who care.
